title: Lost chest and a key
body:
I opened chest and i didnt get anything, so i relogged and my chest and key was gone.
Can someone help?

replies.body: Sometimes when this happens, it turns out that a summoner icon was unlocked.  I took a look into this for you just in case to see what happened!  I see you opened a mastery chest to obtain 150 Orange Essences and a Drop Dead icon!  Grats!  :D
